summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 RAM 1500. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE CONTACT DEPRESSED THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL, BUT IT FAILED TO ENGAGE WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO CHUCK PATTERSON DODGE (257 EAST AVE, CHICO, CA 95926, (530) 895-1771) FOR A ROUTINE INSPECTION AND AN EMISSION MODIFICATION FOR THE ECM. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT TO FILE A COMPLAINT WITH NHTSA. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 62,000.
